document.full_text: top online group buying site group tied up with live nation on monday to launch a new online ticketing deals web site that will allow customers to buy tickets to concerts, theaters and other live events at discounted prices.
document.title: groupon, live nation tie up on ticket deals
lines_and_colors: top online group buying site group tied up with live nation on monday to launch a new online ticketing deals web site that will allow customers to buy tickets to concerts, theaters and other live events at discounted prices.
